properties.name: bremersee.startup.admin.user-name
properties.description: The user name of the administrator.

properties.name: bremersee.startup.admin.password
properties.description: The password of the administrator. Please change it after the first start.

properties.name: bremersee.startup.admin.display-name
properties.description: The first and last name of the administrator.

properties.name: bremersee.startup.admin.email
properties.description: The email address of the administrator.

properties.name: bremersee.startup.admin.preferred-locale
properties.description: The preferred locale of the administrator.

properties.name: bremersee.startup.admin.preferred-time-zone-id
properties.description: The preferred time zone of the administrator.

properties.name: bremersee.user-service.min-search-length
properties.description: The minimum length of a search string.
